name: A. Maximum in Table
statement:
An table is defined as follows: The first row and the first column
contain ones, that is: for all . Each of the remaining numbers in the
table is equal to the sum of the number above it and the number to the
left of it. In other words, the remaining elements are defined by the
formula . These conditions define all the values in the table.You are
given a number . You need to determine the maximum value in the table
defined by the rules above.
